medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began acutely 3 days prior, with severe pain that prevented the patient from getting out of bed for 2 days. Past episodes of RUQ pain were noted but were not as severe or prolonged.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, essential hypercholesterolemia, morbid obesity, impaired fasting glucose, spinal stenosis, generalized neuropathy, non-toxic multinodular goiter, vitamin D deficiency, colonic adenoma, hyperlipidemia, fracture of left proximal humerus, urine incontinence, bowel incontinence, ascending aorta dilation (LVEF of 60-65%). Past surgical history includes appendectomy and hysterectomy.
